perturbation.original_text: Party A supports and guarantees the project construction and development of Party B, and will provide the most preferential policies and all- round service in the aspects of preliminary work, construction and grid-connected of the project, and actively coordinate relevant departments and units to help Party B accelerate project construction progress.
perturbation.changed_text: Party A supports the project construction and development of Party B, and will coordinate relevant departments and units to help Party B accelerate project construction progress.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the clause 'will provide the most preferential policies and all-round service', it creates ambiguity. Later sections may still reference 'preferential policies', but the specific commitment to providing them has been omitted. This omission makes enforcement uncertain, as Party A's obligations are no longer clearly defined and can be claimed with 'local investment promotion policies for foreign investment introduction' in Section V

perturbation.original_text: Party B promises that land nature will not be changed for building large-scale PV grid-connected power generation project in the plot; comprehensive development will be carried out according to relevant national stipulations, such commercial crops will be interplanted as agriculture and forestry as well as medicinal materials; local employees will enjoy the priority to be employed; local building materials will be adopted and relevant expenses will be paid on schedule.
perturbation.changed_text: Party B promises that local employees will enjoy the priority to be employed; local building materials will be adopted and relevant expenses will be paid on schedule.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'land nature will not be changed for building large-scale PV grid-connected power generation project in the plot; comprehensive development will be carried out according to relevant national stipulations, such commercial crops will be interplanted as agriculture and forestry as well as medicinal materials', Party B's commitment to land use and comprehensive development has been omitted. If later sections refer to comprehensive development plans, there's a contradiction because the initial commitment is absent. The 'comprehensive development' and 'relevant national stipulations' are undefined and now the section is open for interpretation, leading to difficulty in enforcement.

perturbation.original_text: Party B will register a foreign-funded company in Fenyi County before implementing the project; Party A will offer all the preferential policies to the company as per local investment promotion policies for foreign investment introduction.
perturbation.changed_text: Party B will register a company in Fenyi County before implementing the project.
perturbation.explanation: The removal of 'foreign-funded' and '; Party A will offer all the preferential policies to the company as per local investment promotion policies for foreign investment introduction' creates an issue. Section I states that 'Party A supports and guarantees the project construction and development of Party B, and will provide the most preferential policies and all- round service'. This section now loses the context of 'foreign investment promotion', meaning there is no longer a guarantee of 'preferential policies' for foreign-funded companies.
